mapper.select: select A.* from exhibition A left join exhibition_detail B on A.id = B.exhibition_id where (A.title like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or B.`description` like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or B.`brief_info` like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) and A.`delete` = 0 and B.`delete` = 0 order by start_time

select count(*) from exhibition A left join exhibition_detail B on A.id = B.exhibition_id where (A.title like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or B.`description` like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%') or B.`brief_info` like CONCAT('%',#{condition},'%')) and A.`delete` = 0 and B.`delete` = 0

select A.*,B.id,description,brief_info,C.file_url,C.file_name from exhibition A left join exhibition_detail B on A.id = B.`exhibition_id` left join file C on B.id = C.`type_id` where A.id = #{exhibitionId}
select C.*,B.`is_carousel`,B.`is_choice`,B.`is_hot` from homepage_hot_config A left join tb_category_exhibition B on A.id = B.`homepage_id` left join exhibition C on B.`exhibition_id` = C.id
select A.* from `exhibition` A left join `tb_category_exhibition` B on A.id = B.`exhibition_id` where B.`is_choice` = 1 and A.`delete` = 0 and B.`delete` = 0
select * from exhibiton where id = #{exhibitionId} and `delete` = 0
